title: Corbel Light?
content:
I like Microsoft's Corbel..but it doesn't have a light face..or a light italic face..  
Is there something I can use very similiar?

Thank you.
author: Victor Xavier

comments.content:
Hi Victor,  
there’s [Shaker](http://web.archive.org/web/20150315231807/http:/typography.net/type/font/shaker) by [Jeremy Tankard](http://web.archive.org/web/20150315231807/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Jeremy%20Tankard), the designer of Corbel. Comes in a number of weights, including Light. Another contemporary sans serif: [Facit](http://web.archive.org/web/20150315231807/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/justanotherfoundry/facit/) by [Tim Ahrens](http://web.archive.org/web/20150315231807/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Tim%20Ahrens), with a Light and even an Extralight.  
F
Awesome! Thanks everyone for your suggestions. I'll post back after having a deeper look at these.
